sense.gloss: number of households, number of houses

sdata.j: ↑大気↑↓たいき↓の↑質↑↓しつ↓は↑過去↑↓か|こ↓↑数↑↓すう|↓↑年↑↓ねん↓において↑悪化↑↓あっか↓した。
sdata.e: Air quality has deteriorated these past few years.

sdata.j: ↑学校↑↓がっこう↓でたば|こ↑吸↑↓す↓う|のはまずいよ。
sdata.e: You are not supposed to smoke at school.
